title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: South Park, day. Now showing at the South Park Community Theatre

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Fanfare begins with a drumroll, a spotlight hits its mark on stage and an announcer speaks

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Ladies and Gentlemen, give it up for JIMMY!  Thank you! Wow. What a terrific audience.  I know what most of you are thinking. "Hey, uh-that guy stole my show..."  Wow, what a great audience. And how about this Michael Jackson guy, huh? I mean, come on...  Wow, what a great audience.  Uh... l... lights, please?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Hey Jimmy.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Butters, w-where is everybody?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Oh yeah, well, about that... Christopher Reeve came to town to do some kind of show, and everyone went to see him.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Christopher Reeve? Christopher Reeve?!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: You know, Christopher Reeve, the guy who played Superman.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: I know who he is! But why is everyone ditching my comedy show to see him?!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Ww-well, because he got crippled, but now he can move his finger. He is an inspiration to us all. That's why everyone ditched on your show.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: So then, how come you came?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Well, because I said I would. Oh, I'm a dork, huh?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: South Park Town Sq... Kenny McCormick Memorial Town Square. Mayor McDaniels is on stage with her aides. Above them a banner reads "STEM CELL RESEARCH." A crowd of people has formed in front of the stage

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: And so without further ado, here's the most courageous, most amazing man on the planet, Christopher Reeve.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Thank you, thank you, wow, what a great audience.  I just flew into South Park. Used to be I didn't need an airplane.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Awwwww.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: As most of you know,  I am a strong supporter of stem-cell research.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Say, fellas! Thanks a lot for goin' to my ...c-comedy show!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: We didn't go to your comedy show.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: I know that, I was being f-f-f-fa...cetious!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Look, dude. Christopher Reeve, dude.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Ooh, Christopher Reeve! Whoop-de-freakin-do!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Dude, that's not cool. You shouldn't make fun of Christopher Reeve.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Yeah dude, not cool.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Though it is controversial,  stem cell research is critical  in the quest for helping  the disabled.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: I put together a comedy show and I was crippled from BIRTH!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Uh, hoo. Guys, I think we'd better stay out of this one.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Yeah, this is starting to look like something we shouldn't be any part of. Let's go play with trucks or something.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Ha-a-aaa-haaa-a.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Can you believe this asswipe, Timmy?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Timmeh!!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Why is a celebrity who became crippled more important than us that were born that way, very much.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Rrruh Timmeh!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: In the coming days  I will prove to the world  that stem-cell research is a miracle.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: The bus stop, day. The boys are on the snow playing with their trucks.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Beep beep beep. Move it, Kenny! Beep.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Hey there fellas.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Oh hey Jimmy, hey Timmy.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Timmih!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Say, would you guys like to join our club? Oh, I'm sorry. You can't. You aren't crippled.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: What?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: To be in our club, not only do you have to be c-c-crippled, but you have to have been born that way. Do you know what that means? No butthole Superman asswipe Christopher Reeve!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: That's nice, guys. We're just gonna stay out of this one.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Hey, wait a minute!  You guys can't just start a club and tell me I can't be in it!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Sorry, able-bodied, you can't join.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Can too!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Hey Timmy. How many able-bodied people does it take to screw in a light bulb? One.  You know what you call an able-bodied guy on the doorstep? Whatever his name is.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Oh God-damnit!!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Cartman, just stay out of it.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: But they say I can't be in their club!!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Cartman, trust me.  We don't want any part in this one.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: "The T-shirt Factory", later. Timmy and Jimmy walk up to it and enter

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Hello, Mr. McGillicuuhuhuhh... Mr. McGillicuddy.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Hello, boys. What can I do for you?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Timmy and I made a ...T-shirt design for our new club.  We just came up with a name this morning.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Uh... boys, I don't think you wanna wear these shirts

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Why not?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Well, because there already is a group that calls themselves the Crips, and I don't think they'd like it too much.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: ...There's already a Crips?!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Well, sure, they're all over at Five Points area in Denver. You've never heard of them?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: No, we never have. Are they crippled from birth or are they cripple wannabes like Christopher Reeve?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: ...Oh, I am stayin' out of this one.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: "The T-shirt Factory", outside. The doors open and Jimmy and Timmy exit

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Can you believe it, Timmy? All this time there was a group for truly crippled people like ourselves, and we didn't know it.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Timmmeh!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Come on. We have to take the bus to Five Points in Denver.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: The Larry King Show on HNN, on air.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: My guest tonight is the brilliant star of stage and screen, Mr. Christopher Reeve, who,. with the help of stem-cell research, is now able to move his arms.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Thanks for having me on again, Larry.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: All right. Chris, the whole world is waiting. Why don't you show us what stem-cell research has done for you. Amazing. Isn't that amazing, folks? Now, Chris, there're some people who say stem-cell research is wrong, that takling cells from a fetus is... unethical.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Well, it just proves that the public needs to be educated  about stem-cell research. See, the stem cells from a fetus like this one  can form into whatever cells of the body are damaged. They are the most powerful thing on the planet.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: And how does someone like yourself make use of the stem cells, Chris?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Well, it's very simple.  And now you can see, my arms have better movement.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Wow.  Wow.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Five Points, Denver. A bum pushes a cart full of his belongings past Denver Meat Packing, a rundown warehouse. Sirens, gunshots, and a woman's screams are heard.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Excuse me, sir.  we're looking for a group of people called the Crips.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: You are?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Do you know where they meet? We've already tried the rec center and the library.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: The Crips hang out at that old warehouse down there,  but ...nobody goes in there.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Oh, it's okay. We're Crips ourselves. Come on, Tim-Tim.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Timmmih!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Denver Meat Packing, inside. The music is thumping, there's gambling and general conversation going on. Jimmy and Timmy walks in

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Well hello everyone.  I'm Jim Swanson, and this is my friend Timmy.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Timmmih!  Tih... ti-timmih.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Well, let us tell you a little bit about ourselves. Timmy and I are both true Crips, born and raised. We're the only Crips in South Park, where we live, and we would love to join your fa-fa-fabtasitc Denver chapter.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Is they for real, manh?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: We just have one question before we join your c-club. Do you think it's better to be born a Crip, or to become a Crip later by accident?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: The only Crips is born Crips, dawg.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Yeah, you can't become a Crip by accident, fool!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: I agree. I mean, it's like  "come on"! Why do these people who become crippled later in life think they're such great pot-potatuhs?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Timmih!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Well, we're glad you see it our way, fellas. So can we join your g... group?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: All right, you wanna thug with the Five Point Crips? Bitches, all you gotta do is pop some punk-ass Bloods.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Well, sure. Tim and I would love to pop some punk-ass Bloods. We're terrific at it.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Timmih?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: I don't know, Timmy, just play along.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Uh-tu-Timmih!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: So you sayin' yuh down?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Down like a clown, Charlie Br... Down like a clown, Charlie B-broooowww... Down like a clown, Charlie Browh... Bro-uh-own. Down like a clown, Charlie Br-Brown.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Say Timmy, did you notice that all the crippled people in that club are negros?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Timmih!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: That's an amm-mmazing coincidence. I mean, there's not one crippled colored person in South Park.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Hey you kids.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Well hello, officers.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: What the hell do you think you're doin'?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: We're goin' to pop some punk-ass Bloods.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Timmih!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Look, Timmy. There's a convenience store.  That must be what the fellas meant by "pop some punk-ass Bloods." They want us to get them some soda pop and treats.  Let's buy them ginger ale and marshmallows. Then they'll let us in the club for sure.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Oh, Timmih.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Oh shit!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Suh, suh, suh, suh, Sssunday driver!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: back at Denver Meat Packing, night. Jimmy and Timmy are back at the warehouse

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Yo yo, listen up y'all! Let me tell you about my little Gs, Roller and 4 Legs here. They just smoked thirteen Bloods in one night!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: One night?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: You're kiddin'? You're kiddin'? One night?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: That ain't never been done before!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: And they got us marshmallows and ginger ale.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Uh huh. Cool. He's right.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: So does that mean we can join the c-c...club?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: You're not just in, you're the baddest mofo Crips in town! Cipac!  Turn up the beat so we can celebrate our new Gs Five-Points style!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: All right.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Wow, these guys really are crippled. Timmy, I have a feeling that this is the start of something b-b-b-b...b-b-brilliant.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Timmih!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Jimmy's home. A car drives up and drops off Timmy and Jimmy. The occupants are Crips

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Thanks for the ride home, fellas. We sure had a ...terrific time.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Alrighty. Keep it real though, dawg.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: You dawgs keep it real, too.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Timmih!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Well, that sure was a terrific time. Let's go all around tomorrow and show everyone our new outfits, Timmy.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Timmih!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Jimmy's house, inside. His parents sit before the TV, his mom worried

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: There you are, Jimmy!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Whatup, Mazie? Ye-yo, Pops?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Jimmy, you rmother was gettin' worried about you.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: No need to worry about me. I'm cool like a fool in a swimming ppp-ppp-pp-pp-pool.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Outside, somewhere, day. A reporter begings speaking to the camera

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Tom, I'm standing out front of the Stem Cell Research Facility with terrific news. Christopher Reeve, who was once paralyzed, claims that he can now stand.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Thank you everyone.  To most people, this is just an ordinary fetus. But to people like me,  it's hope.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Uugh.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Reeve tosses the carcass away, then he drops his feet to the floor, then he slowly rises from his wheelchair and raises his arms in victory. The crowd oooos and ahhhs

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: What an inspiration.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Tom, many celebrities have spoken out in protest of stem-cell research, but, after seeing this, how can they protest now?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Stay clear, guys, stay clear.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Yup. I'm not seeing anything.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: City Wok, day. Mr. Kim is wiping the counter down. Timmy and Jimmy enter dressed in their Crip outfits.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Hey  Hey, I don't want no trouber!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Hello. We'd like two orders of Kung ...Pao Chicken, please.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: I don't want no trouble! You jus... take what you want and reave!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Timmih!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: OH! Okay, okay!  I opening register

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Timmh.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: What's that? Oh, and one medium lemonade, please.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Timmih.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Here. Here one hundred twelve dorrar! It's all I have. Yeh take!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Hunh?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: You take! Uh one hundred twelve dorrar!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Ah- are you sure?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: I no want no trouble. Just take it and reave!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Well gee, that's really nice of you, Mr. ...Chinese person.  Look Tim-Tim, we got a cash prize. We must be the ...one hundredth customer or something.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Here! Here two order of Kung Pao Chicken, and small ice tea!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Actually, it was a regular lemonade.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: AAAAAGH-agh!!  I sorry! I sorry! I no want no trouble.  Here. Remonade. Now go, just go!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Gee, thanks a lot. See you next time.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Timmih!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Hello! Police? I've just been robbed by two gang members!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Jimmy's house, later. His parents are standing by the kitchen's breakfast nook sipping coffee. A door opens in the living room, then closes

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Jimmy? Jimmy, could you come into the kitchen please?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Yo, Mamsie. What's up, Pops?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Uh have a seat, Jim. Your mother and I need to talk to you.  Son, your mother and I have noticed a change in your behavior. And... we're worried that you might be involved in a gang.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: A what? Oh, you mean the fellas. Well sure. But I can't talk about the club on account of it's sssuper secret, dawg.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Then it's true! Oh, Ryan, it's true!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Why you be trippin', Mom? I mean  come on. I'm finally a part of something, very much.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Jimmy, those people you're hanging out with are no good.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Yo, don't be dissing my niggaz, dawg. They're my f... friends.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: And what about your standup comedy, Jim, huh? Are you just giving up on that, too?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Nobody cared about my standup comedy! All that hard work just to be outshined by C-Christopher Reeve the super b-butthole!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Uh Jimmy, we've told you before. God made you the way he did for a reason!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Right. Because you and Mom used to make fun of crippled kids in high school.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: That's right. You were sent here through the vengeful and angry hand of God to teach your mother and I a lesson. And that's a big responsibility, son.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Look! My gang, which I can't talk about because it's super secret, is the most important thing to me now! And if you two don't like it, you can just pass the blunt to the nigga on your left.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: A darkened lab. Christopher Reeve is pacing back and forth, having a headache.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Where's that delivery of new fetuses?! Feeling weak again.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Here's the new shipment, sir.  Hey!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Hello there, Christopher.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Well, well, Gene Hackman, my nemesis from the movies. How are you?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: I'm good. You?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: I am better with each passing day. Stronger and more agile.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Christopher, I've come to ask you to stop what you're doing?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: What?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Using stem cells is like playing God. You should leave nature alone.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: And go back to the way I was? Is that what you're saying, Hackman?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: I'm saying that sometimes you need to just live with the cards you're dealt, Christopher.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Stop calling me Christopher! That name no longer has meaning to me! Christopher was someone who lived in a wheelchair! Always being pushed around by others! The old Christopher Reeve is dead! From now on, I am...  Chris!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Jimmy's house, night, living room. He sits on the floor between the couch and the coffee table working on a jigsaw puzzle

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Sixty-five... bottles of... beer on the wall. Six-

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Payback time, mothafucka!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Jesus Christ!  Holy G...guacamole! Freakin' Frijoles!  Leapin' L-langosta.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: East Side Bloods!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: We're Detectives Hyde and Richardson from the Special Gang unit in Denver.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Any word on who shot up me and Timmy's houses, officer?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Word on the street is it was a retaliation hit by the Bloods.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: The... B-Bloods?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: You know, smart-mouth! Your rival gang! The Bloods are at war with the Crips, they kill each other all the time!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: The-they do??

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Don't act like you don't know, you lil punk! The Crips and Bloods hate each other, and if you stay in that gang, you're gonna end up dead too.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: But... but why do they hate each other?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Look kid, I used to be a Crip myself, but I'm not anymore!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Oh, so you used ssstemm cells like Christopher Reeve?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Come on. The only way these kids are gonna get out of their gang is get killed.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Sarah!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Oh boy, Timmy, we should have never started a gang for people crippled from birth. Now they're at war with the people who are crippled from an accident. Boy were we wrong.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Tim-mih.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Wow, w-we've got to do something, Timmy. We've gotta get the Crips and Bloods to sstop fighting. I bet if we could just get them together... but how? Wu-wait a minute! I've got it! A lock-in at the rec center! We did it for our church once. All we do is rent out the rec center overnight. They lock the doors so nobody can leave, and then everyone has the whole night to play in the swimming pool and laugh and talk.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Timmih!!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: You get all the Crips you can to the rec center tomorrow night, Timmy. And I'll try to get all the ...Bloods there.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Timmih!!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: This is gonna be t-terrific!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: South Park, next day, in from ot Tom's Rhinoplasty

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Tom, several years ago, actor Christopher Reeve had a horrible accident and was paralyzed. The irony, of course, is that the man who played Superman could no longer walk. America watched in wonder as he managed to move one of his fingers, then his arms. And now, seen for the first time on HBC, Christopher Reeve is going to lift a truck up over his head.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Oh, what a fighter.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: That brave, brave man.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: He's an imspration to us all.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Tom, the irony is even more irony-y as it appears that the stem cells have given Christopher Reeve almost superhuman strength.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Chris, that's enough!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Hello, Gene! So good to see you!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: You're cured, Chris. It's time to stop using stem cells.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Stem-cell research has made me stronger than I ever thought possible! Why stop now?!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Uh Tom, apparently, Gene Hackman, the man who played Superman's enemy Lex Luthor in the movies, has now shown up as a celebrity protester of stem-cell research. If that isn't ironic, Tom, I don't knw what is.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: They're affecting your mind, Chris. If you won't stop using stem cells, then we'll stop you!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Stop me?! Stop me?! HA!!  You won't stop me, Hack Man!  Ha HA! Ha HA! Ha haa haa!  Ya ha ha! Yaa haha!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Tom, if irony were made of strawberries, we'd all be drinking a lot of smoothies right now.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Denver Recreation Center, night. Gang members file through the doors. Jimmy and Timmy greet everyone at the door. Timmy is disgusied as Groucho Marx, Jimmy wears a ten-gallon hat.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Come on in, everybody. Lots of su-surprises and t-treats inside.  Great to see you all. What a terrific audience.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Are you sure you got everything you need, young man?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: We sure do. Thanks, Mr. Apple...b-by.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Just remember to make sure the kids play safe in the pool area.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: You bet.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: I'll be back at seven to let you out. You kids have a good time.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Oh, we will.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Denver Recreation Center, inside. A group of Bloods enter the gym and stop in their tracks. At the other end of the gym is a group of Crips, seated on some bleachers behind a basketball hoop. The Crips stand in reply

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: The Bloods!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Oh shit! It's a trap!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Muthafucka Crips tryin' to smoke us all out!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: What the hell is goin' on here?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: It's called a lock-in at the rec center. We can use all the rec center facilities. We can play basketball, go swimming, or even just kick it in the lounge area with some games and ...p-puzzles.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Timmih!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: But nobody can leave until it's seven a.m., so if you wanna have a good time, you're all just gonna have to learn to get along.  Theeerrre's pizzaaa.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Nighttime, near the city. The reporter stands next to a man-made lake

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Tom, over five years ago, doctors told Christopher Reeve that he would never walk again, but the resilient actor fought back, struggled against all odds, and has now built his very own Legion of Doom!  The once immobile Mr. Reeve's new organization will be commited to world domination and evil. What an inspirational story, Tom.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Legion of Doom Headquarters, inside. Christopher Reeve is standing before a group of villains, both real and imagined.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: I have chosen each member of this elite group of supervillains for their outstanding treachery,  Their desire for world conquest, and their hatred of all things good! And I've assembled this group for one purpose! To once and for all find a way to...  get rid of Hack Man!!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Uhhh, how about domination of the world?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Yeah. Or uh, death to the infidels?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Silence! OUR job is to see to it that Hack Man is put out of commission.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Oh boy, General Disarray, muh maybe we just oughtta stay outta this one.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Not so fast, Chris!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Hack Man!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: We just helped pass a ban on stem-cell research. Your fetus-sucking days are over!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: No...  NOOOO!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: And now we're goingn to put you somewhere where you can never touch another fetus again!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Denver Recreation Center, inside. The Bloods and Crips challenge each other.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: You stupid mofos are dead!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Make the first shot, punk!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Hold it! Don't you see? It doesn't matter if we were crippled from birth, or crippled in an accident. We're all brothers.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Save it, fool! Crips ain't our brothers!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Look: we hve the whole rec room to ourselves. Can't we all just try having some fun together?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: You talkin' crazy, dawg.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Yeah, we ain't playin', sucka!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Why don't we at least give it a chance? I mean,  Come on!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Wait a minute. What did you say?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: I said, "I mean,  Come on!"

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: You know, maybe he's right. I mean, Come on!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Come on.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: I guess we could at least give havin' fun together a try. It's like  Come on.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Yeah. Come on.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Yeah, that's right. Come on.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Come on.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Come on.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Yeah, that's right. Come on.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: I've gotta give you two dawgs props for puttin' an end to all this hate.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: I told you, lock-ins at the rec center always work. And you know, I've learned something, too. I was player-hatin' Christopher Butthole Reeve because he got more attention than me. But just like... y-you guys, I need to learn to control my a... anger.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Right on!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Hey little Roller, try some of this chronic shit.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Timmih!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: I guess we all learned that trying to get along is way better than p... player hatin'.  The gang wrote a song about it. Why don't we listen in?

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: It used to be that Crips and Bloods didn't get along,

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
role: But now we're all a family, so we wrote this song.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
role: Naaa na naaa, Crips and Bloods. Naaa na naaa, hope and love.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Outer space. Christopher Reeve is flung into space in a pane of glass.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: You haven't seen the last of me, Hack Man! I will be back!!

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: The woods near South Park, night. Stan and friends watch the celestial spectacle

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Dude, I am so glad we stayed out of that one.

title: KRAZY KRIPPLES
text: Mee tooo.
